data.title: Operating System Assignment
data.meta_description: Operating System Assignment - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. S. Abinaya is a student in Class IV B.Tech(IT A) at an unknown university. The document discusses operating systems, providing definitions and examples. It describes several commonly used operating systems, including Ubuntu, Android, Mac OS X, iOS, and Windows. Ubuntu is an open-source Linux distribution that is free, customizable, and updated regularly. Android is an open-source mobile OS used widely on smartphones. Mac OS X and iOS can only be used on Apple hardware. Windows is the most widely used desktop OS.
